div.p: Herma–us, steward of Claudius Munatianus, to the sitologus of Pacerce Eastern, greetings. Transfer, from the amount you hold on deposit for Claudius Munatianus, from the wheat-crop of the 4th year of Hadrianus Caesar the lord, to Herais . . . of Sarapion, eight (and) one-eighth artabas, total 8 ⅛ art. Year 5 of Hadrianus Caesar the lord, month, day. (N. Gonis)
